body: This currently will create an "alias" of the tensor "other". I think it would be better to copy the data to match NumPy semantics and the `new_from_data` overload.
body_html: This currently will create an "alias" of the tensor "other". I think it would be better to copy the data to match NumPy semantics and the new_from_data overload.
